name: Crystal Command
description:
Challenge other players in solo or team battles, where you will collect crystals, build armies, and destroy enemy structures. Guide minion waves down lanes through enemy defenses to defeat your opponent's Elder God in this intense tug-of-war experience.
Spend crystals to construct buildings which summon minions to march in your waves. There are 6 minion types with unique strengths and weaknesses, so adaptive strategy is required for proper counterplay.
Use purchasable abilities to battle other players for map control. Ore Deposits and Control Points are scattered around the map, which are critical to success. With tactical resource management, quick-thinking, and clever strategy, you are sure to conquer Elders' Domain.
However you play, its gonna rock!
